articles.title: Meta To Lay Off 10,000 Employees In Second Round Of Job Cuts - NDTV
articles.description: Facebook-parent Meta Platforms said on Tuesday it would cut 10,000 jobs, just four months after it let go 11,000 employees, the first Big Tech company to announce a second round of mass layoffs.
articles.content:
